name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Senior Frontend Engineer
professional_summary: Built a client portal using React.js, integrating RESTful APIs for data management, which improved user engagement.
Developed reusable components and front-end libraries, reducing development time for future projects.
Optimized React components for performance and scalability, ensuring faster load times and smoother user experiences.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define and deliver new features, aligning with business goals.
Ensured code quality through unit testing and linting, maintaining high standards across projects.
Participated in code reviews and continuous integration processes, fostering a culture of collaboration and improvement.
Utilized JavaScript (ES6+) and React.js to build dynamic and responsive user interfaces.
Implemented state management using Redux and Context API, enhancing application state consistency.
Integrated GraphQL endpoints to fetch and manage data efficiently, improving data retrieval speed.
Worked with frontend build tools like Webpack and Babel to streamline the development workflow.
Managed version control using Git/GitHub, ensuring code integrity and team collaboration.
Implemented responsive design principles using HTML5 and CSS3, ensuring cross-device compatibility.
Explored TypeScript to improve code reliability and maintainability, though still learning its nuances.
Contributed to CI/CD pipelines, automating testing and deployment processes for faster releases.
Used Jest and React Testing Library for unit testing, ensuring robust and bug-free code.
Experimented with Next.js for server-side rendering, though still in the learning phase.
Incorporated Tailwind CSS for utility-first styling, speeding up the design process.
Gained basic exposure to Node.js and Express, understanding backend integration with frontend systems.
